Item.name: ADS Magazine
Item.description: Magazine for the ADS filled with medium sized steel bolts capable of penetrating walls and targets alike.

Item.name: APS Magazine
Item.description: Magazine for the APS filled with medium sized steel bolts capable of penetrating walls and targets alike.

Item.name: SPP-1 Steel Bolt
Item.description: Small steel bolt capable of penetrating walls and targets alike.

Item.name: PX-11 Steel Bolt
Item.description: Small steel bolt capable of penetrating walls and targets alike.

Item.name: Explosive Bang Stick Charge
Item.description: A lethal Bang Stick charge, very effective against marine predators.

Item.name: Stun Bang Stick Charge
Item.description: A non-lethal Bang Stick charge, great for fending off marine predators.

Item.name: Large Titanium Anchorhead Harpoon
Item.description: A large and heavy harpoon with what seems to be a sharpened anchor for it's tip. Provides extreme penetration, the very definition of the unstoppable force

Item.name: Large Titanium Hammerhead Harpoon
Item.description: A large and heavy harpoon with what seems to be a bulky cylinder with a slot for explosives for it's tip. Deals heavy blunt damage. Here's your hammer, now just find an anvil.
A ordinary harpoon for the harpoon gun, great for piercing armor.
A strange looking harpoon, these aren't common

Item.name: High-Explosive Harpoon
Item.description: A harpoon with lethal explosives strapped to it
Great stuff, deals true damage. No amount of armor will help

Item.name: Stun Explosive Harpoon
Item.description: A harpoon with non-lethal explosives strapped to it

Item.name: EMP Explosive Harpoon
Item.description: A special explosive harpoon capable of frying the most complex electronics

Item.name: Flare Harpoon
Item.description: flare harpoon greatly help in illuminating dark caverns, corridors and silhouettes. It's hot and glows brighter than a glowstick.

Item.name: Glowstick Harpoon
Item.description: A glowstick harpoon, easier to find in the dark than a regular harpoon.

Item.name: Floating Harpoon
Item.description: A harpoon for the harpoon gun balanced out with some rubber. Flies slower but straighter and does not sink after it hits something.

Item.name: Blunt Tip Harpoon
Item.description: A harpoon with a blunt tip that deals blunt trauma to it's targets, staggers for longer and doesn't stick or pierce very well.

Item.name: Blunt Tip Flare Harpoon
Item.description: Blunt tip flare harpoon greatly help in illuminating dark caverns, corridors and silhouettes. It's hot and glows brighter than a glowstick.

Item.name: Blunt Tip Glowstick Harpoon
Item.description: A blunt tip glowstick harpoon, easier to find in the dark than a regular harpoon.

Item.name: Blunt tip Floating Harpoon
Item.description: A blunt tip harpoon for the harpoon gun balanced out with some rubber. Flies slower but straighter and does not sink after it hits something.
